meanings.definition: The online world of computer networks and the internet.
meanings.sent1: I love exploring cyberspace to find new websites.
meanings.sent2: Many people spend hours in cyberspace chatting with friends.
meanings.sent3: In cyberspace, I can be a superhero with just a few clicks.
meanings.sent4: Her mind wandered through the vast cyberspace of information.
meanings.sent5: Navigating cyberspace is like diving into a sea of knowledge.

meanings.definition: The virtual environment of digital communication.
meanings.sent1: Cyberspace allows us to connect with people from all over the world.
meanings.sent2: Businesses use cyberspace to promote their products and services.
meanings.sent3: I got lost in cyberspace trying to send a simple email.
meanings.sent4: His ideas floated freely in the endless cyberspace of creativity.
meanings.sent5: Exploring cyberspace feels like entering a futuristic realm.
